description:
The team visits the fortune-telling app Appmon, Tellermon, to find the location of the next Seven Code Appmon! But when Tellermon is infected with the L-Virus...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mirai wa Zenbu Mieteiru!? Shinpi no Uranai Telamon
You See the Whole Future?! The Mysterious Divinator, Tellermon!
未来は全部見えている!? 神秘の占い・テラーモン
